snippet.title: 2020 Update Trailer | Neo Mario Galaxy Archives
snippet.description:
https://aurumsmods.com/nmg
Neo Mario Galaxy is an unofficial modification of Super Mario Galaxy 2. This hack can be played legally on any homebrew-enabled Wii or Wii U console. No backup images or hardware modifications are required. The awesome logo animations were created by SY24. The background music used in this trailer was created by AJ Dispirito. Thanks to both of you for your great work. :)
